original: lo ka n'a tha s'a dha nam /
analyzed: lo ka n'a tha s'a dha nam /

translated: The Means of Attaining the Lord of the World

original: 'jig rten mgon po la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'jig rten mgon po la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Lord of the World.

original: 'dir sngon gyi cho gas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bdun pa'i gsum pa'i sa bon bcu gsum pas gnon pa /
analyzed: 'dir sngon gyi cho gas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bdun pa'i gsum pa'i sa bon bcu gsum pas gnon pa /
translated: Here, by the method of the previous [means of achievement], on a moon maṇḍala, the seed syllable of the third [vowel] of the seventh [consonant] is pressed by the thirteenth [consonant].

original: zla ba'i thig les rnam par brgyan pa /
analyzed: zla ba'i thig les rnam par brgyan pa /
translated: It is adorned with a drop of the moon.

original: de rnams yongs su gyur pa las dpal ldan 'jig rten mgon po zhi ba ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ba /
analyzed: de rnams yongs su gyur pa las dpal ldan 'jig rten mgon po zhi ba ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ba /
translated: From that transformation, one should meditate on glorious Avalokiteśvara, peaceful, wearing a crown of hair,

original: sku zla ba bzhin du dri ma med pa /
analyzed: sku zla ba bzhin du dri ma med pa /
translated: his body stainless like the moon,

original: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
analyzed: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /

original: phyag g-yon na padma bsnams pa /
analyzed: phyag g-yon na padma bsnams pa /
translated: holding a lotus in the left hand,
and granting boons with the right.

original: phyag gnyis khu tshur bcings nas gung mo padma kha ma bye ba lta bu /
analyzed: phyag gnyis khu tshur bcings nas gung mo padma kha ma bye ba lta bu /
translated: The two hands are clenched into fists, with the index fingers like unopened lotus buds.

original: padma dang zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs par bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: padma dang zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs par bsgom par bya'o //
translated: He sits on a seat of a lotus and moon.

original: 'di'i phyag rgyas rgyas gdab par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di'i phyag rgyas rgyas gdab par bya'o //
translated: One should seal him with this mudrā.

original: aom ma ni padme h'um zhes pa yi ge 'bum du bzlas pas sdig pa thams cad dag par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: aom ma ni padme h'um zhes pa yi ge 'bum du bzlas pas sdig pa thams cad dag par 'gyur ro //
translated: By reciting the syllable Om mani padme hum one hundred thousand times, all sins will be purified.

original: gnyis dang gsum gyis rmi lam du mthong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gnyis dang gsum gyis rmi lam du mthong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: By reciting it two or three times, one will see [the deity] in a dream.

original: bye ba bzlas na mtshams med pa lnga byas pas kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bye ba bzlas na mtshams med pa lnga byas pas kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: By reciting it ten million times, one will attain accomplishment, even if one has committed the five acts of immediate retribution.

original: dpal ldan 'jig rten mgon po'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
analyzed: dpal ldan 'jig rten mgon po'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
translated: The sādhana of the glorious Lokanātha is complete.
